name: DailyDadJokeOnDemand
0:
”Alexa, open Daily Dad Joke”
”Alexa, ask Daily Dad Joke to give me a new joke”
”Alexa, ask Daily Dad Joke to say it again”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily dad joke
des:
You can depend on us to deliver you a guaranteed* groan-worthy dad joke that you'll want to share** with your family, friends and co-workers.

These are the same jokes you can hear from our "Daily Dad Joke" Flash Briefing skill, but now you can hear a new random one, on demand, performed for you by a real, live dad.

You can even have it repeated back to you, as many times as you want, just in case you want to really take in our timeless delivery.

In other words, this is exactly the skill you've been looking for all your life.

If you're interested in hearing one new joke a day, consider also adding our "Daily Dad Joke" Flash Briefing skill.


* not guaranteed
** you won't want to share it, but we know you probably will anyway
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
